A wizened devil's cut off finger.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.lovers_watch.t: Clockwatch with the hands that indicate the Seconds missing.
Though left alone in the maddening abyss, the watch continued to tick, undisturbed
item.ironbounds_artefacts.magicians_mono: "Now, peer into the unseen, and experience the truths of the cosmos"
item.ironbounds_artefacts.judgement_scal: Pure golden scale, having witnessed countless trials.
"Weigh your heart, be the judge of only yourself"
Amulet often worn by an Old Hermit.
"The Ancient One That Watches Peers Through The Hermetic Amulet..."
The Crown of a Long Decayed Lich, feels horrible just looking at it.
Allows the creation of Greater Undeads
Allows the creation of Greater Undeads.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.amulet_of_hold: Can be imbued with four spells.
As a drawback however, it will decrease the potency of all spells.
item.ironbounds_artefacts.archmage_spell: Spellbook dropped by the apprentice of an Archmage.
spell.ironbounds_artefacts.wish.guide:
You express a wish to an extra planar being.
Different items will have different effects.
Wishing with a scroll will cause you to cast the spell inscribed on it with a level bonus equal to the level of wish.
Additional effects may be discovered.
The item in your main hand has got priority, and your offhand will only be used if your main hand is empty.
spell.ironbounds_artefacts.guide: You continually freeze the creatures that surround you for the duration of the spell. Frozen creatures are unable to move and cast spells and attack.
